title: Advanced Programming Quiz
description: Welcome to the advanced programming quiz. Test your knowledge with these challenging questions!

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm has the best average case performance?
What is the time complexity of accessing an element in a hash table?
Which design pattern ensures a class has only one instance and provides a global point of access to it?
In which programming language is the concept of 'everything is an object' a key feature?
What does the acronym 'API' stand for?
Which of the following is a NoSQL database?
What is the purpose of the 'git merge' command in Git?
Which of these is a fundamental principle of Agile methodology?
In object-oriented programming, what is encapsulation?
